meanings.definition: A light at the front of a vehicle
meanings.sent1: The headlight of the car illuminated the dark road ahead.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to turn on your headlight when driving at night.
meanings.sent3: The headlight of the truck winked at the oncoming traffic.
meanings.sent4: Her bright smile was like a headlight in the gloomy room.
meanings.sent5: The headlight shone like a beacon guiding us home.

meanings.definition: A light on the front of a train
meanings.sent1: The headlight of the locomotive pierced through the fog.
meanings.sent2: The headlight of the train warned others of its approach.
meanings.sent3: The headlight of the train played hide and seek with the tunnel walls.
meanings.sent4: His determination was a headlight in the darkness of doubt.
meanings.sent5: The headlight of the train cast a warm glow on the platform.

meanings.definition: A light on the front of a bicycle
meanings.sent1: The headlight on the bike flickered as it hit a bump.
meanings.sent2: Riding at night is safer with a bright headlight on your bicycle.
meanings.sent3: The headlight on the bicycle winked at the passing pedestrians.
meanings.sent4: The headlight of the bicycle cut through the evening mist like a knife.
meanings.sent5: The headlight on the bicycle guided the way through the dark streets.
